it was midnight of the 3rd of november

at the residence of the foreign minister
on hurrying to his residence i found

it appeared as though they had just

on that occasion the foreign minister
first explained in general terms

now according to his explanation as

with no signs of any conciliatory

our country has been placed in a

since the deployment of our military

it must be said that the situation from

it is needless to say that since the

i thought it would be practically

i decided that there was no one but

until that evening premier tolja was a

as he was in his kimono and hakama
during the course of discussion with

it was revealed the prime minister had

to be an extremely difficult one but

number one america's preparation for war

number two americans public opinion was

would not look for war he repeatedly
